metadata.notes: Title is on the cover page. Skewed text. Uneven binding. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Page numbers 53/54 are missing. Page numbers 57-58 appear twice. No title page found. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found.
